turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can i be of your assistance?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with ordering pizza from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: order pizza from Bella Luna, sure i can do that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizza would you like to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like three small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 small size pizzas ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what are your choice of toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like one pizza with pepperoni, one pizza with sausage and red onions, and one veggie lover's pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so thats 1 with pepperoni, 1 with sausage and red onions, and 1 veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, could you please make those pizzas with thin crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, so all 3 small pizzas with thin crust is that what you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your total comes to 40 dollars, shall we go ahead and make that order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. That would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was all I needed today. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are welcome, enjoy your pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, I will.
